name: TP-THNCL5-400_ADD
action: [IF]([AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(ARO_System_Required)*>,Yes),[EQ](<*VALUE(RESS_System_Required)*>,Yes))){<* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:TP-THNCL5-400)*><*SETATVQTY(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:TP-THNCL5-400, <*Eval(<*VALUE(ARO_OTP_hardware_&_software_required)*>+<*VALUE(RESS_OTP_hardware_&_software_required)*>) *>.)*><* DoResetAtt *>}{[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(ARO_System_Required)*>,Yes)){<* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:TP-THNCL5-400)*><*SETATVQTY(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:TP-THNCL5-400, <*Eval(<*VALUE(ARO_OTP_hardware_&_software_required)*>) *>.)*><* DoResetAtt *>}{[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(RESS_System_Required)*>,Yes)){<* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:TP-THNCL5-400)*><*SETATVQTY(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:TP-THNCL5-400, <*Eval(<*VALUE(RESS_OTP_hardware_&_software_required)*>) *>.)*><* DoResetAtt *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]
